title: The Letter: a film about legal rights. - [Polish version].
creator_credit: Aleksi Vellis, Richard Jones, Legal Aid Commission of Victoria and Film Victoria
brief_description: A guide to the basic legal rights, entitlements and responsibilities of people living in Australia, particularly non-English speaking migrants. The laws relating to business, presumption of innocence, issues relating to employee/employer relations, financial support, racism, anti-discrimination and tenancy laws are discussed. Illustrates differences between legal rights in Australia and in other countries. Dubbed in Polish.
